alert.note: Alert for Brookings; Kingsbury; Lake; McCook; Miner; Moody (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 15 at 8:28PM MST until December 16 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Minnesota and east central and southeast South Dakota. * WHEN...Until noon CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility will be worst in rural areas and may fluctuate and change drastically over short periods of time and distance.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Brookings; Kingsbury; Lake; McCook; Miner; Moody
